user_query: I'm a food blogger and I'm looking for cake recipes to feature on my blog. Can you provide me with a list of cake names and images to choose from? Also, I need the detailed recipe for a cake with ID 5. Additionally, fetch the details for a restaurant with ID 56c467cb7b0d464811a42017 and provide me with its address. Lastly, could you send me the prediction and other data for an image with the URL '0026c6e1-3988-4060-85b3-3cdfbce8a201.jpg'?

TaskList.description: Fetch a list of cake names and images to feature on the blog.
Get the detailed recipe for the cake with ID 5.
Fetch the details for the restaurant with ID 56c467cb7b0d464811a42017 and get its address.
Send a request to get predictions and other data for the image with the provided URL.
